tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ImagingStudies (
  patient_id INT,
  study_date DATE,
  study_type VARCHAR(50),
  study_result TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY(patient_id, study_date)
)

CREATE TABLE imaging_studies (
 study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 patient_id INT,
 study_date DATE,
 imaging_type VARCHAR(255),
 result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_history (
 patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR(255),
 age INT,
 diagnosis TEXT,
 treatment_plan TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE imaging_studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  study_date DATE,
  imaging_type VARCHAR(100),
  results TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_records (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  dob DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE disease_progression (
  progression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  evaluation_date DATE,
  disease_stage VARCHAR(20),
  treatment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE imaging_studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    study_date DATE,
    study_type VARCHAR(50),
    study_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100),
    dob DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    primary_physician VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE disease_progression (
    progression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    progression_date DATE,
    progression_stage VARCHAR(20),
    progression_notes TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE ImagingStudies (study_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, study_date DATE, study_type VARCHAR(50), imaging_results TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(100), date_of_birth DATE, gender VARCHAR(10))
CREATE TABLE StudyResults (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, study_id INT, result_date DATE, result_details TEXT)
CREATE TABLE DiseaseProgression (progression_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, progression_date DATE, progression_notes TEXT)
CREATE TABLE StudyHistory (history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, study_id INT, history_date DATE)
